title: Curried Coleslaw with Green Onions and Currants
directions: Whisk mayonnaise, lime juice, and curry powder in large bowl to blend. Add cabbage, carrots, green onions, currants, and jalapeño and toss to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 2 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Toss before serving.)
ingredients: 5 cups thinly sliced green cabbage (from about 1/2 large head)
